com.csm.rover.simulator.wrapper

Class Globals

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csm.rover.simulator.wrapper.Globals

  • public class Globals
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class that handles simulation time and some globally required functions.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Globals getInstance()
        Returns the singleton instance of the Globals class, initializes Globals if not created
        Returns:
        Singleton of Globals

      • addClockIncrementEvent

        public void addClockIncrementEvent(java.lang.Runnable event)
        Observable pattern that is triggered every time the clock advances a millisecond.
        Parameters:
        event - Runnable action to be called

      • startTime

        public void startTime(boolean accel)
        Begins the simulation clock allowing the simulation to run.
        Parameters:
        accel - Whether or not to accelerate the simulation. False will run in Real-Time

      • getTimeAccelerant

        public double getTimeAccelerant()
        Returns the multiplication factor for accelerating the simulation time step.
        Returns:
        The acceleration multiplier

      • getTimeScale

        public double getTimeScale()
        Returns the multiplication factor currently in use in the simulation. Will be 1 for real-time and equivalent to getTimeAccelerant when accelerated.
        Returns:
        The current multiplier

      • timeMillis

        public long timeMillis()
        Returns the current simulation time in milliseconds
        Returns:
        time in ms

      • subtractAngles

        public double subtractAngles(double first,
                             double second)
        Returns the coordinate difference of the two angles. If the second angle is clockwise of the first returns the negative, if counterclockwise returns positive. Functions around the wrap point.
        Parameters:
        first - The first angle
        second - The second angle
        Returns:
        The coordinate difference between input angles

      • subtractAnglesDeg

        public double subtractAnglesDeg(double first,
                                double second)
        Equivalent to Math.toDegrees(subtractAngles(Math.toRadians(first), Math.toRadians(second))).
        Parameters:
        first - The first angle
        second - The second angle
        Returns:
        The coordinate difference between input angles

      • setUpAcceleratedRun

        public void setUpAcceleratedRun(HumanInterfaceAbstraction HI,
                                int runtime)

      • registerNewThread

        public void registerNewThread(java.lang.String name,
                              int delay,
                              SynchronousThread thread)
        Register a thread to the synchronous system
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the thread
        delay - The interval the thread should be given permission on in milliseconds
        thread - The thread

      • checkOutThread

        public void checkOutThread(java.lang.String name)
        Remove a thread from the synchronous system
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the thread

      • killThread

        public void killThread(java.lang.String name)
        Kill a thread and remove it from the synchronous system
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the thread

      • threadCheckIn

        public void threadCheckIn(java.lang.String name)
        Should be called to indicate when a thread has completed an operation. When all threads including the simulation clock are complete, time is advanced and new run permissions granted.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the thread

      • delayThread

        public void delayThread(java.lang.String name,
                        int time)
        Suspends a thread from operating for a given period of time. If the thread is not registered in the synchronous system, delays the current thread.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the thread
        time - Time to delay in milliseconds

      • threadIsRunning

        public void threadIsRunning(java.lang.String name)
        Informs the synchronous systems that the thread is running.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the thread

      • getThreadRunPermission

        public boolean getThreadRunPermission(java.lang.String name)
        Checks is the thread has permission to run. This check will revoke run permission.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the thread
        Returns:
        true if the thread has permission
